text: Guest in the House (re-release title Satan in Skirts) is a 1944 American thriller movie directed by John Brahm and was based on the play of the same name. It stars Anne Baxter, Ralph Bellamy, Aline MacMahon, Ruth Warrick, Marie McDonald, Jerome Cowan, Percy Kilbride and was distributed by United Artists. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1946. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1944 thriller movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Lewis Milestone
title: Guest in the House
